page.title: 15Reacreation_Golf
page.content: Filey Golf Course is an 18 hole course on top of Filey cliffs. 13 people work in the Clubhouse and at the bar. There are 150 members who play golf and practice on the course on most days.There are 925 members a year who play on the course.There also 40 children members.There is club professional who takes about 10 lessons per week to help members play golf.The membership fees are Â£60 for adults and Â£35 for children.Players lose up to 20 balls a week.The club opens at 8:30a.m. and shuts at 9:30 p.m.Mr.Curry gets up at 7a.m.The age range of players is for 10 years old to 81 years old.Mr.Curry likes his job very much at his golf course.The 7th is the longest hole on the course.
